verses.verse: Paul <WG3972>, a servant <WG1401> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, called <WG2822> to be an apostle <WG652>, separated <WG873> unto <WG1519> the gospel <WG2098> of God <WG2316>,

making request <WG1189>, if by any means <WG1513> now <WG2235> at length <WG4218> I may be prospered <WG2137> by <WG1722> the will <WG2307> of God <WG2316> to come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209>.

that <WG5124> is <WG2076>, that I with <WG1722> you <WG5213> may be comforted <WG4837> in you <WG1223>, each of us by the other <WG240>'s faith <WG4102>, both <WG2532> yours <WG5216> and <WG5037> mine <WG1700>.

for that they <WG3748> exchanged <WG3337> the truth <WG225> of God <WG2316> for <WG1722> a lie <WG5579>, and <WG2532> worshipped <WG4573> and <WG2532> served <WG3000> the creature <WG2937> rather than <WG3844> the Creator <WG2936>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> blessed <WG2128> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>. being filled with <WG4137> all <WG3956> unrighteousness <WG93>, <WG4202> wickedness <WG4189>, covetousness <WG4124>, maliciousness <WG2549>; full <WG3324> of envy <WG5355>, murder <WG5408>, strife <WG2054>, deceit <WG1388>, malignity <WG2550>; whisperers <WG5588>,
